title: Blox Fruits: Complete Guide to Unlocking and Maximizing Race V4

steps.title: Meet the prerequisites.
steps.content: Meet the prerequisites. There are a few requirements to unlock Race V4: Be in the Third Sea Have Race V3 in any race Defeat rip_indra at least once Obtain 1 Mirror Fractal from the Dough King

steps.title: Go to Castle on the Sea and interact with the stone tablet.
steps.content: Go to Castle on the Sea and interact with the stone tablet. The tablet is located in the area where King Red Head is trapped, behind the boss room. If you haven't defeated rip_indra, you must do so before continuing, as it's a necessary step of the Sealed King quest which unlocks the Race Awakening trials.

steps.title: Travel to the Great Tree and climb to the top.
steps.content: Travel to the Great Tree and climb to the top. At the top of the tree is an invisible NPC named "MISC."

steps.title: Speak to MISC.
steps.content: Speak to MISC. After doing this, you will be teleported to the Temple of Time.

steps.title: Go down the hall and speak to the second NPC.
steps.content: Go down the hall and speak to the second NPC. You will be teleported back to MISC on the Great Tree.

steps.title: Return to the tablet on Castle on the Sea.
steps.content: Return to the tablet on Castle on the Sea. If you interact with the tablet, it will say "That place may hold the key to a greater power, but you must undergo a trial to grab hold of it. Powers involving time always work best under the light of a full moon." This is a hint for the next step.

steps.title: Find a Mirage Island.
steps.content: Find a Mirage Island. You can do this by sailing in Sea Danger Levels 1 through 6, but you have a better chance to find one in Sea Danger Levels 4, 5, or 6. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Go to the highest point of the Mirage Island and wait until night time.
steps.content: Go to the highest point of the Mirage Island and wait until night time. You must have a Mirror Fractal in your inventory to complete the next step.

steps.title: Wait until night time, then activate your race ability.
steps.content: Wait until night time, then activate your race ability. After doing this, stare at the moon for a few seconds. Once you see the message "Your Mirror Fractal has resonated with the moon" you can move to the next step.

steps.title: Find the Blue Gear.
steps.content: Find the Blue Gear. After charging your Mirror Fractal, a Blue Gear will spawn somewhere on the Mirage Island. It will despawn when night ends. The gear emits a bright cyan blue glow. [2] X Research source To proceed, simply touch the Blue Gear.

steps.title: Return to the Temple of Time.
steps.content: Return to the Temple of Time. Go to the hallway on the right, then immediately turn right next to the boxes. Keep moving forward until you can turn left, then jump up once you go past the boxes in this hallway. Turn around and jump onto the stone edge around the top of the hallway to find the lever.

steps.title: Pull the lever.
steps.content: Pull the lever. A door will appear. This door will give you access to the five trials to fully awaken your race to V4.

steps.title: Wait for a full moon.
steps.content: Wait for a full moon. Full moons happen every eight in-game nights. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Activate your race ability in front of your race trial door during the full moon.
steps.content: Activate your race ability in front of your race trial door during the full moon. Once the full moon shows through the clouds, you and the two other players must activate your race abilities at the same time in front of your respective trial doors. Once you do this, the trial door will open.

steps.title: Enter the open door and complete your race trial.
steps.content: Enter the open door and complete your race trial. Each race has a different trial. You must complete the trial within the time limit to move to the next step, and you can't move to the next step until the other two users have finished their trials. Humans must complete the Trial of Strength , which involves defeating either the Flame, Quake, Light, Dark, or Rumble Master within the time limit. Sharks must complete the Trial of Water , which involves defeating a Sea Beast within the time frame. Rabbits must complete the Trial of Speed , which involves completing a maze within the time limit. Angels must complete the Trial of the King , which involves completing a cloud parkour obstacle course within the time limit. Ghouls must complete the Trial of Carnage , which involves defeating all the waves of Ancient Zombies and Ancient Vampires within the time limit. Cyborgs must complete the Trial of the Machine , which involves dodging all the bombs dropping from the ceiling within the time limit.

steps.title: Win a PvP battle against the other two players.
steps.content: Win a PvP battle against the other two players. Once you and the other two players have finished your trials, you must be the last one standing in a PvP battle against them. If you do not win the trial, you'll have to try again.

steps.title: Follow the glowing orb to the Ancient Clock.
steps.content: Follow the glowing orb to the Ancient Clock. Once you win, a glowing orb will appear that leads you to the Ancient Clock. Once you reach the Ancient clock, interact with the orb, and then the clock.

steps.title: Place the first gear in the slot.
steps.content: Place the first gear in the slot. This will unlock Race Awakening (V4) for your race, but you can continue doing trials to fully max out your race's skills and passives.

steps.title: Speak to the Ancient One.
steps.content: Speak to the Ancient One. The Ancient One is an NPC that looks like a red orb, and it's located near the stairs to the Ancient Clock.

steps.title: Complete the required training.
steps.content: Complete the required training. To gain access to the second trial, you must activate Race Awakening three times (which correlates to being in awakened form for about three minutes). You can only enter your awakened form when your awakening meter is full. The meter is charged by taking and dealing damage, and you gain more charge when fighting other players instead of NPCs.

steps.title: Give the Ancient One 1,000 Fragments.
steps.content: Give the Ancient One 1,000 Fragments. Once you complete your training, you must give the Ancient One 1,000 Fragments to get access to the second trial.

steps.title: Complete the second trial.
steps.content: Complete the second trial. All trials follow the same format as the first trial, but get increasingly harder with each subsequent trial.

steps.title: Speak to the Ancient One and complete the required training.
steps.content: Speak to the Ancient One and complete the required training. To gain access to the third trial, you must activate Race Awakening five times (which correlates to being in awakened form for about five minutes).

steps.title: Give the Ancient One 1,500 Fragments.
steps.content: Give the Ancient One 1,500 Fragments. Once you complete your training, you must give the Ancient One 1,500 Fragments to get access to the third trial.

steps.title: Complete the third trial.
steps.content: Complete the third trial. All trials follow the same format as the first trial, but get increasingly harder with each subsequent trial.

steps.title: Speak to the Ancient One and complete the required training.
steps.content: Speak to the Ancient One and complete the required training. To gain access to the fourth trial, you must complete three training lessons. After finishing each lesson, you'll need to give the Ancient One some Fragments, and you'll unlock an upgrade. Training 1: Be in awakening form for 4 minutes Cost: 2,000 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 3 Training 2: Be in awakening form for 5 minutes Cost: 2,250 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 4 Training 3: Be in awakening form for 10 minutes Cost: 2,500 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 5

steps.title: Complete the fourth trial.
steps.content: Complete the fourth trial. All trials follow the same format as the first trial, but get increasingly harder with each subsequent trial. The fourth trial is the final trial with a battle component.

steps.title: Speak to the Ancient One and complete the required training.
steps.content: Speak to the Ancient One and complete the required training. To finish maximizing your awakening, you must complete five training lessons. After finishing each lesson, you'll need to give the Ancient One some Fragments, and you'll unlock an upgrade. Training 1: Be in awakening form for 8 minutes Cost: 3,000 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 6 Training 2: Be in awakening form for 10 minutes Cost: 3,250 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 7 Training 3: Be in awakening form for 13 minutes Cost: 3,500 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 8 Training 4: Be in awakening form for 15 minutes Cost: 3,750 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 9 Training 5: Be in awakening form for 18 minutes Cost: 4,000 Fragments Unlocks: Energy Training Tier 10

steps.title: Speak to the Ancient One once more.
steps.content: Speak to the Ancient One once more. Your race awakening is now fully complete, and the Ancient One will say "It seems you've made this power your own. I've done all I can for you." You can complete Race V4 on other races, as well. If you decide to do this, you'll only need to start from the steps for the first trial.
